fields.name: Item drop:
fields.value:
Max Nut (8%)
Attack: Powerful
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Watchdog**: Watch a Target, Roleblocking and attacking 2 random visitors, if your target is not visited and they are not a Koopa, you will directly attack them instead.
- **Last Hurrah** (1x): Charge at 2 players, you will attack them both, they must be neighbors in the playerlist, you will die upon using this ability.
